Text:
I notice that no one has commented or voted on the quality on this upload, so I'll step up. I've finished downloading the first four episodes, and the report so far is: Content as advertized, and of excellent quality. So, to anyone who wants season 1 of Krod Maldoon, this is the torrent for you.

Thanks, MeesterDaveed!
Thanks Meester, good quality, +1 from me, cheers.
